## Project Overview

:::{.text-justify}
The wildfires in the Paraná Delta, Argentina - previously studied for Day 10 challenge - were brought up again to analyze from the point of view of its vegetation.

Sentinel-2 imagery was used in Google Earth Engine to calculate [NDVI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Normalized_difference_vegetation_index) before and after the fire, highlighting the presence and condition of the vegetation immediately prior to and following the events. Using these NDVI values, [dNBR](https://www.un-spider.org/advisory-support/recommended-practices/recommended-practice-burn-severity/in-detail/normalized-burn-ratio) was also computed, an index commonly used to estimate burn severity.

Negative NDVI values were masked and interpreted as water bodies or watercourses.
:::

## Data Sources and Tools

* ESA's [Harmonized Sentinel-2 (MSI)](https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/datasets/catalog/COPERNICUS_S2_SR_HARMONIZED) with Google Earth Engine
* Province boundaries: [National Geography Institute of Argentina](https://geoportal.ign.gob.ar/)
* Basemap: [Argenmap by National Geography Institute of Argentina](https://www.ign.gob.ar/AreaServicios/Argenmap/Introduccion)

****
* Made with ![](../images/QGIS.png){width=1em style="vertical-align: middle;"}[GIS](https://qgis.org/project/overview/) 3.22.4-Białowieża

## Google Earth Engine code

<details>
<summary>Click to view</summary>

```javascript {filename="GEE Script Day 15-Fire"}
// 1. Load ROI
Map.addLayer(roi.style({color: 'purple', fillColor: '00000000', width: 2}), {}, 'ROI');

// 2. Define dates for before and after the fires
var date1 = ee.DateRange('2019-12-01', '2019-12-31');
var date2 = ee.DateRange('2020-09-01', '2020-09-30');

// 3. Load Sentinel-2 imagery, filter by cloud % and roi bounds
var s2_pre = ee.ImageCollection('COPERNICUS/S2_SR_HARMONIZED')
  .filterDate(date1)
  .filterBounds(roi)
  .filterMetadata('CLOUDY_PIXEL_PERCENTAGE', 'less_than', 30) // 30% clouds max
  .median()
  .clip(roi);

var s2_post = ee.ImageCollection('COPERNICUS/S2_SR_HARMONIZED')
  .filterDate(date2)
  .filterBounds(roi)
  .filterMetadata('CLOUDY_PIXEL_PERCENTAGE', 'less_than', 30)
  .median()
  .clip(roi);

// 4. Calculate NDVI
var ndvi_pre = s2_pre.normalizedDifference(['B8', 'B4']).rename('NDVI_pre');
var ndvi_post = s2_post.normalizedDifference(['B8', 'B4']).rename('NDVI_post');

// 5. Calculate NBR and dNBR
var nbr_pre = s2_pre.normalizedDifference(['B8', 'B12']).rename('NBR_pre');
var nbr_post = s2_post.normalizedDifference(['B8', 'B12']).rename('NBR_post');
var dnbr = nbr_pre.subtract(nbr_post).rename('dNBR');

// 6. Establish visualization parameters
var ndviParams = {min: 0, max: 1, palette: ['brown','yellow','green']};
var dnbrParams = {min: -0.5, max: 0.5, palette: ['blue','white','red']};

// 7. Plot map
Map.centerObject(roi);
Map.addLayer(ndvi_pre, ndviParams, 'NDVI pre-incendios');
Map.addLayer(ndvi_post, ndviParams, 'NDVI post-incendios');
Map.addLayer(dnbr, dnbrParams, 'dNBR pre-post');

// 7.1 Legend function
function addLegend(title, palette, min, max, labels) {
  var legend = ui.Panel({
    style: {
      position: 'bottom-left',
      padding: '8px 15px'
    }
  });

  var legendTitle = ui.Label({
    value: title,
    style: {
      fontWeight: 'bold',
      fontSize: '14px',
      margin: '0 0 4px 0',
      color: 'black'
    }
  });

  legend.add(legendTitle);

  var lon = ee.Image.pixelLonLat().select('longitude');
  var gradient = lon.multiply((max - min) / 100.0).add(min);
  var legendImage = gradient.visualize({min: min, max: max, palette: palette});

  var thumbnail = ui.Thumbnail({
    image: legendImage,
    params: {bbox: [0, 0, 100, 10], dimensions: '200x20'},
    style: {margin: '4px 0'}
  });

  legend.add(thumbnail);

  var labelPanel = ui.Panel({
    widgets: [
      ui.Label(labels[0], {margin: '0 8px'}),
      ui.Label(labels[1], {margin: '0 8px', textAlign: 'right', stretch: 'horizontal'})
    ],
    layout: ui.Panel.Layout.flow('horizontal')
  });

  legend.add(labelPanel);

  Map.add(legend);
}

// 7.2 Add legends to map

// NDVI legend
addLegend(
  'NDVI',
  ['brown','yellow','green'],
  0, 1,
  ['Low vegetation', 'High vegetation']
);

// dNBR legend
addLegend(
  'dNBR',
  ['blue','white','red'],
  -0.5, 0.5,
  ['Negative (regrowth)', 'Positive (burned)']
);
```
</details>
